item.title: "I Don't Think So": Ant-Man Star Addresses Whether They Will Ever Return In The MCU
item.description: One of the Ant-Man series veterans opens up on whether they think they will ever reprise their Marvel Cinematic Universe role in the future.

item.title: If You Love Adam Sandler's Big Daddy, Check Out This Underrated Family Movie Trending On Netflix
item.description: Instant Family (on Netflix) makes for the perfect blend of comedy and heart, similar to Adam Sandler's beloved comedy Big Daddy.

item.title: “I Was So F**king Impressed”: Tom Cruise’s Next Movie Will Show Off His “Unprecedented” Range & Leave Stunts Behind, Director Reveals
item.description: Tom Cruise's next movie will show off his "unprecedented" range and leave stunts behind, director Alejandro González Iñárritu reveals.

item.title: L.A. Zoo Elephants Billy, Tina Transferred to Tulsa Zoo Under Cover of Night
